title: The Activism Behind Google's Walkout
description:
Around the world Thursday, employees of Google stood up and walked out of work. They were protesting the company's response to accusations of sexual misconduct by executives. David Meyers speaks to Bloomberg's Technology Executive Editor Tom Giles on the role big tech's employees play in social activism.
FOLLOW UP
Bloomberg's latest report: Google Workers Stage Mass Walkout to Protest Handling of Sexual Misconduct
You can follow Tom at: @tsgiles
----
 TicToc is a daily news podcast hosted by David Meyers (@davidfmeyers), produced at Bloomberg Worldwide HQ in New York City. You can follow up with us and watch our reporting @tictoc. If you like it, be sure to rate us on iTunes, and tell your friends!
